Fist.name: Fist
Fist.desc: Smash the face of the enemy!

EmptyHand.name: Empty Hand
EmptyHand.desc: Free hands are the free speech! Untie your tongue and cheer up your team!

MagnetAccelerator.name: Magnet Accelerator
MagnetAccelerator.desc: Model used in Eternal Revolutions. A dangerous toy in the wrong hands

Receiver.name: Receiver
Receiver.desc: Unintelligible noise. As you go deeper into the mines, the clearer the voice inside becomes
Receiver.message_1: 25... Laplace's Angel... conscience without will... the holy bane of reptiles....
Receiver.message_3: 37..........and our world will be ruled by The Dogs.
